In English, adjectives should be put in this order: opinion, size, age, color, origin and material.
A friendly, large, old, yellow, Amazonian snake.
An expensive, white, cotton wedding dress.
A slow-moving, large, new, purple, polluting dump truck.
A playful, smart, big, heavy, young, brown English horse.
An empty, hot, flat Pacific beach.
A busy, fast-moving, large, new, curved, highway system.
A well-lit, large, old, haunted house.
A hot, big, high, bright-burning campfire.
